module.name: Plot_Venn
module.desc: This app draw veen plot for a given dataset.

param.name: main
param.desc: Character giving the main title of the diagram

param.name: sub
param.desc: Character giving the subtitle of the diagram

param.name: main.cex
param.desc: Number giving the cex (font size of the main title

param.name: sub.cex
param.desc: Number giving the cex (font size of the subtitle

param.name: force.unique
param.desc: Logical specifying whether to use only unique elements in each item of the input list or use all elements. Defaults to FALSE

param.name: print.mode
param.desc: Can be either 'raw' or 'percent'. This is the format that the numbers will be printed in. Can pass in a vector with the second element being printed under the first

param.name: sigdigs
param.desc: If one of the elements in print.mode is 'percent'

module.help: input format is a matrix like this: A B C D E #header j b o m g u e x j t r m x m h d u v n x f p b m o n j o j q j h r l q e g v g a h j g m a w g o l k --------------------------------------------- The palettes are derived from package ggsci : npg: Â Nature Publishing Group aaas: American Association for the Advancement of Science nejm: The New England Journal of Medicine lancet: Lancet Oncology jama: The Journal of the American Medical Association jco: Journal of Clinical Oncology ucscgb: The UCSCGB palette is from the colors used by UCSC Genome Browser for representing chromosomes d3: The D3 palette is from the categorical colors used by D3.js (version 3.x and before). locuszoom: The LocusZoom palette is based on the colors used by LocusZoom igv: The IGV palette is from the colors used by Integrative Genomics Viewer for representing chromosomes uchicago: The UChicago palette is based on the colors used by the University of Chicago startrek: This palette is inspired by the (uniform) colors in Star Trek tron: This palette is inspired by the colors used in Tron Legacy futurama: This palette is inspired by the colors used in the TV show Futurama rickandmorty: This palette is inspired by the colors used in the TV show Rick and Morty simpsons: This palette is inspired by the colors used in the TV show The Simpsons
